Name: Resident Evil Re:Verse
About the game: Beloved Resident Evil characters clash in a fight to the death! Test your skills against other players in six-person deathmatch battles. But don't forget the terrifying creatures! You'll need to master the skills of the heroes and creatures alike if you want to claw your way to victory! Note: A Capcom ID is required in order to play.
